commentText: Synchronized method to create a schema if is does not already exist.__@return The currently loaded schema
codeText: private JsonSchema getOrCreateSchema() throws Exception {_        synchronized (this) {_            if (this.schema == null) {_                this.schema = this.schemaLoader.createSchema(getCamelContext(), this.getResourceAsInputStream())__            }_        }_        return this.schema__    }
